sentences.en: Adam and Eve, according to the fable, wore the bower before other clothes.
sentences.cn: 按照传说, 亚当和夏娃在穿衣服之前,以枝叶蔽体.

sentences.en: And in the spirit of each there is a bower for my spirit.
sentences.cn: 在两个人的灵魂深处,都有一座供奉我的心灵的殿堂.

sentences.en: Bower asks Sir Martin Sorrell , who appointed Ms Beers, why she was chosen.
sentences.cn: 保尔询问任命比尔斯的马丁?斯瑞爵士(SirMartinSorrell), 选择她的理由是什么.

sentences.en: Bower is probably best known for his weighty and sober work on strategy and resource allocation.
sentences.cn: 保尔在策略及资源分配方面的重量级严谨论著可能最为知名.

sentences.en: Build of your imaginings a bower in the wilderness ere you build a house within the city walls.
sentences.cn: 在你们建房于城墙内之前，先用你们的想像在旷野建一所凉亭。

sentences.en: Content to bloom in native bower Although the place be small.
sentences.cn: 不嫌自己园亭狭小,愿意努力开花.

sentences.en: From her tree toad bower with her three - toed power the she - toad vetoed him.
sentences.cn: 在三趾蟾蜍女郎的卧室,三趾蟾蜍女郎用它的三趾能力将二趾蟾蜍的念头打消了.

sentences.en: He sat in the bower to have a rest.
sentences.cn: 他坐在凉亭里,休息一会儿.

sentences.en: In Elbow Bower the mower winnowed winnowed the minnows away fro the powwow.
sentences.cn: 在肘子凉亭里,割草者为巫医筛掉小鱼.

sentences.en: Lucy arranged her bower and put on her best white frock.
sentences.cn: 露西整理好闺房,然后穿上她最好的白色连衣裙.

sentences.en: Or if were down one hour , down in yon shady bower.
sentences.cn: 或许瞬间就会降临,降临在那幽暗的凉亭.

sentences.en: She rolls the curtain up and light comes in her bower.
There is a bower in the middle of the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 院子当中间儿有个凉亭.

sentences.en: They sat under the leafy bower at the end of the garden and watched the sun set.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在花园尽头由叶子搭成的凉棚下观看落日.

sentences.en: To enclose in or as if in a bower; embower.
sentences.cn: 处于或似处于凉亭中; 用凉亭遮茵.

sentences.en: To woo females, the males of 17 of the 20 known species of bowerbirds build structures—often resembling an arbor, or bower, with an artfully decorated platform.
sentences.cn: 在已知20种园丁鸟中，有17种会为了向雌性求爱而建造房屋——它们的建筑物常常很像凉亭，有装饰性的平台，设计精巧，技艺高超。

sentences.en: Weaves a Bower in endless Night.
sentences.cn: 在无限夜晚编织一座凉亭.

words.tran_cn: 种植园或农场；酒徒充斥的街区

trans.tran_cn: 凉亭，树荫处，闺房，船首锚
trans.tran_en: a pleasant place in the shade under a tree
